title: Điện Biên Phủ Victory Quiz
description: Test your knowledge about the Điện Biên Phủ Victory with these challenging questions!

questions.question: When did the Battle of Điện Biên Phủ take place?
questions.explanation: The Battle of Điện Biên Phủ took place from March 13 to May 7, 1954, marking a crucial victory for the Vietnamese forces against the French.

questions.question: Which country was the main opponent of Vietnam in the Battle of Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: France was the main opponent, as the battle was part of the First Indochina War between the French colonial forces and the Viet Minh.

questions.question: Who was the Vietnamese general leading the campaign at Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: General Võ Nguyên Giáp was the mastermind behind the Vietnamese strategy, leading the Viet Minh forces to victory through careful planning and execution.

questions.question: Which military strategy did the Vietnamese forces use to defeat the French at Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: The Viet Minh used an encirclement and siege strategy, cutting off French supply lines and bombarding their positions until they surrendered.

questions.question: What was the name of the French commander at Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: Christian de Castries was the French commander in charge of the defense at Điện Biên Phủ, ultimately surrendering after the prolonged siege.

questions.question: How long did the Battle of Điện Biên Phủ last?
questions.explanation: The battle lasted for 56 days, from March 13 to May 7, 1954, culminating in a decisive Vietnamese victory.

questions.question: What was the significance of the Battle of Điện Biên Phủ?
options: It marked the beginning of the Cold War
It led to the end of French colonial rule in Indochina
It caused the Vietnam War to start
questions.answer: It led to the end of French colonial rule in Indochina
questions.explanation: The defeat at Điện Biên Phủ forced France to negotiate peace and eventually withdraw from Indochina, leading to Vietnamese independence.

questions.question: Which agreement was signed after the Vietnamese victory at Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: The Geneva Accords were signed in 1954, dividing Vietnam into North and South at the 17th parallel, pending future elections.

questions.question: What type of terrain posed a challenge for both French and Vietnamese forces at Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: The rugged mountainous and jungle terrain made logistics and movement difficult for both sides, but the Viet Minh adapted better to these conditions.

questions.question: Which of the following weapons were heavily used by the Vietnamese forces at Điện Biên Phủ?
questions.explanation: The Viet Minh relied heavily on artillery and anti-aircraft guns, which were transported through difficult terrain and used effectively against French positions.
